entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
